attributes.action: A FAIR PENSION FOR ALL NOW
attributes.additional_details: It is time that the Government giave all pensioners a decent living wage,most pensioners have paid into their pensions during their working lives and it is not theiir fault that every Government had spent the money that was collected.As we are are member of the EU  we should get the same as the Germans etc.It is no excuse saying that people are living longer, we have paid all our dues and are not scroungers.I am sure that all the money given away (billions) in Aid, I am sure that the pension could be improved. How would any MP like to live on under £100 a week.
